BASS.NET wrapper licensing notice

Source:
- https://www.radio42.com/bass/bass_purchase.html
- https://www.radio42.com/bass/bass_register.html
Retrieved: 2026-02-21

Bass.Net.dll is the managed wrapper and is separate from native BASS binaries.
Upstream pages indicate freeware use may be allowed for personal,
non-commercial, non-money-making software, under strict conditions.

Important:
- You must satisfy BASS.NET wrapper conditions.
- You must also satisfy native BASS licensing terms from un4seen.
- Do not treat this summary as a substitute for upstream legal text.
